channel.title: algebra on lonerapier.xyz
channel.description: Recent content in algebra on lonerapier.xyz

item.title: Group Theory
item.description: Groups Groups $G$ are algebraic structures which are set and has a binary operation $\bigoplus$ that combines two elements $a, b$ of the set to produce a third element $a\bigoplus b$ in the set.

item.title: Finite Fields
item.description: Fields Algebraic structure on which basic math can be performed. Properties Abelian group under addition Non-zero numbers form abelian group under multiplication multiplicative distribution over addition Finite Fields (Galois Fields) Fields defined on a number and the result is in the set.

item.title: Meromorphic Functions
item.description: Holomorhpic function (also known as Analytic function) usually refer to functions that are inifinitely differentiable. Formal Definition: Let G be an open set in $\mathbb{C}$.

item.title: Divisors
item.description: Definition of divisor of a rational function $z \in k(C)$: Degree of a divisor as $deg \space D = \sum_{P \in \mathbb{C^*}} n_p$
